    • Constructor Detail

      • Tag

        public Tag(org.bukkit.entity.Player owner,
           List<TagController> owners)
        The default constructor for the tag object. This class should not be used in most scenarios, use the main class: MultiLineAPI.
        Parameters:
        owner - The player who owns the tag.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear the player's lines. Removes all lines except the player's default name.

      • clear

        public void clear(TagController owner)
        Clear the player's lines associated with a tag controller. Removes all lines the TagController has added.
        Parameters:
        owner - The TagController to clear the lines of

      • removeLine

        public void removeLine(TagController owner,
                       int index)
        Remove a line from this tag object based on its index.
        Parameters:
        owner - The TagController to remove a line of
        index - The index of the TagLine that should be removed

      • getEntities

        public int[] getEntities()
        Get an array of entity IDs that the stack is comprised of.
        Returns:

      • getEntityPairings

        public int[][] getEntityPairings()
        Get a 2D integer array that represents the pairings map. Only contains entity IDs
        Index 0 is the list of vehicles
        Index 1 is the list of passengers
        Returns:
        the entity ID pairing maps

      • refreshPairings

        public void refreshPairings()

      • updateEntityLoc

        Get the owner of the Tag
        Returns:
        The owner of the Tag

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Remove the tag from the player. This includes removal of the name, lines and the base entities. Clears all localized data

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refresh all entity data and entity pairings on this tag
